Topic.Title: [Suggestion] Be able to sort games by there language

Posts.EditableText: Most Text adventures are in english and it would make things easier for people who are not native speakers and want to find games in their own language.
Posts.HTML: Most Text adventures are in english and it would make things easier for people who are not native speakers and want to find games in their own language.

Posts.EditableText:
Hello!

Yes Xilefenko, its one thing in the roadmap for the next updates. 

The games will have a language associated with it and can be filtered by that language.

We are currently working on the web localization system so that languages can be added to it and all the texts of the part that users see can be seen in the available languages. When we integrate this first step, we will enter the part of the games and their new filters.

Thanks for the suggestion!
